deleted_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the criterion was deleted.

change_status.last_change_date_time.description: The date and time of the last change made to the criterion.

campaign.id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with the criterion.

campaign_criterion.resource_name.description: The resource name of the criterion.

campaign_criterion.campaign.description: The specific campaign this criterion is targeting.

campaign_criterion.age_range.type.description: The age range targeting type for the criterion.

campaign_criterion.mobile_application.na.description: The name of the mobile application targeted by the criterion.

campaign_criterion.negative.description: Indicates whether the criterion is a negative targeting criterion.

campaign_criterion.youtube_channel.chann.description: The YouTube channel ID targeted by the criterion.

campaign_criterion.youtube_video.video_i.description: The YouTube video ID targeted by the criterion.
